summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackClarify skin without stripping away essential moisture with this gentle Clarify & Cleanse Bar from Good Molecules.
details: DetailsBenefitsVeganCruelty-FreeSuitable for all skin types, including sensitiveKey IngredientsKaolin clay balances signs of excess sebum while antioxidant-rich cocoa powder soothes inflammation and redness.Rosehip and grapeseed oils nourish and maintain a healthy moisture balance while promoting elasticity.Salicylic acid prevents appearance of blemishes and breakouts.Formulated WithoutSoap/harsh cleansing agentsItem 2582411How To UseWet the bar and work up a creamy lather. Massage your hands over face and body, avoiding contact with eyes. Rinse well and pat dry.IngredientsSodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Polyglyceryl-4 Laurate, Water, Glycerin, Kaolin, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Organic Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Fruit Powder, Salicylic Acid, Rosa Canina Seed Oil, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate.
how_to_use: Wet the bar and work up a creamy lather. Massage your hands over face and body, avoiding contact with eyes. Rinse well and pat dry.

reviews.headline: I am constantly stocking up on this!
reviews.comments: This bar is one of the only cleansers that actually work for me! Every time I use it my skin is left feeling and looking super clean! It removes impurities so well.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Love this cleansing bar. It gets down in the pores and has a great lather

reviews.headline: Yes, I will continue to purchase
reviews.comments: I love this product, the price is not just great but the  ingredients and how clean my face feels.

reviews.headline: Does exactly what it needs to do
reviews.comments: Great value does exactly what it advertised amazing price. This product is a perfect example of why love good molecules.

reviews.headline: Works wonderfully
reviews.comments: Good molecules is so amazing….this has taken care of my stubborn hyperpigmentation and acne! I say go for it❣️

reviews.headline: My favorite eco packaged cleanser
reviews.comments: This bar suds up nicely, doesn't overly strip, and cleanses well. It's kept my pores clean for years now. Plus it comes in plastic free packaging.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: REAL REVIEW! I originally gave it to my boyfriend but he never used it, i was having break outs so i decided to try it. Immediately it calmed my redness, by the end if the day my break outs were smaller and less painful. I struggle with adult "acne" (mainly little painful pimples) and i break out on my monthly. This is a life saver! I have used tons of products and this is by far my favorite. I have found its brightened my skin, cleared dead skin, i even found its softened fine lines which isnt even listed in the description but its amazing and doesnt burn my eyes either! A+. Also, ive been using this for about 2 months now and all i can say is the results just get better and better!

reviews.headline: Love love love
reviews.comments: I have been using this product for almost 3 months now and it has been amazing for my skin! I have comodogenic acne btw.  I have oily skin so i do recommend but if you have dry skin im sure it would be too stripping.

reviews.headline: best purchase ever
reviews.comments: ive had acne for quite some time, ive been trough spiroaccuatne,every soap/skincare product imaginable ive spent so mucj money trying to clear my face and this is the only thing that works!

reviews.headline: best purchase ever
reviews.comments: ive had acne for quite some time, ive been trough spiroaccuatne,every soap/skincare product imaginable ive spent so mucj money trying to clear my face and this is the only thing that works!

reviews.headline: Bad reaction
reviews.comments: After using this once my face broke out really badly. I had burns on my lip and breakout/ pimples all over. I didn't use it again and my face has returned to normal. I am not sure what caused it but will not use again.

reviews.headline: Works like a dream
reviews.comments: I've struggled with discoloration and redness on my face from my KP most of my life. First time use from this evened out my face. I hadnt seen it this clear since i was a kid. Ive been using it 1-2xs a day everyday for months now and i will never stop buying this!! Perfect for super sensitive skin, their entire skin care line is as well. Makes you feel clean without drying or irritation

reviews.headline: Conscious beauty
reviews.comments: I love this product for my face and body, and it does a good job at removing makeup too! I also love that it has sustainable packaging and that it's a low-waste product.

reviews.headline: Love! Switching to simple products
reviews.comments: I used to spend so much money on fancy facial products, especially face wash. I am so glad that I switched to this face wash. My skin has never been clearer and I am so happy with this simple soap.

reviews.headline: This product is amazing
reviews.comments: Absolutely would recommend. It has helped balance my skin tone.

reviews.headline: Yes buy
reviews.comments: Pretty good

reviews.headline: Awesome
reviews.comments: It does a great job of not drying your skin out, AT ALL. it's very simple and works. would recommend

reviews.headline: So good
reviews.comments: Makes my face so smooth and helped with acne

reviews.headline: Works as Advertised
reviews.comments: This generally keeps my acne and excessive texture at bay. The first time I tried it, I loved it, and it lasted me months. The second time, I loved it a little less, as they changed the formula and it is a tiny bit less effective. It makes my skin a little dry now, so I need extra moisturizer. And it doesn't do as much for my hormonal acne as it used to. It does reduce the amount of blemishes I have on my face and back though.

reviews.headline: Good for Acne Prone Skin
reviews.comments: For the longest time I used expensive cleansers that did not really have a big impact on my acne, but this cleansing bar really did it. Its able to tackle all of my acne, even the hormonal.

properties.name: Best Uses

values.label: Face, neck and my chest area

display_values: Face, neck and my chest area

faceoff_positive.comments: Can someone explain to me why this 5 dollar bar soap completely changed my skin in a week?? I bought this on a whim with other products, I have been using it on my body only for a week as I have lots of very stubborn body acne for like... 8 years that I am trying everything to get rid of, I thought an acne fighting soap bar couldn't hurt in conjunction with the other stuff I'm doing. Ummm. It's the best my back and chest has ever looked. And I thought... huh... is this puny little SOAP BAR really making a difference? So I tried it on my face today. Y'all WHAT?! I am glowing!!! I look like a literal angel. Is this forreal??? Basically the only thing I am using on my back now is this bar, the good molecules niacinamide TONER (also incredible) every other day bc every day was too much for my skin, and a really good moisturizer from another brand w squalene and rose hip oils in it. And then sometimes some head and shoulders shampoo for the zinc pyrthione, like 1-2 times a week, and a glycolic exfoliator once a week.  Anyways, thoroughly confused. Now officially obsessed with Good Molecules.  Please try this if you have body or face acne. It's 5 bucks. I have acne prone, very sensitive, combination oily and dry skin, for the record. Including rosacea. So... all the things.
faceoff_positive.headline: Blown Away!!

faceoff_negative.comments: I had high hopes for this cleansing bar. Despite it being a bar as opposed to in a bottle of some sort, it seemed to be exactly what I was looking for (I just find bars to be messy). I've been using it for about 3 weeks now and my skin has only gotten worse. Now, I try to be patient and understand that it can take time for skin to get used to new products. But I thought I'd start seeing an improvement by now. Then, tonight when I used this to wash my face, I used a completely white wash cloth to dry my face off and the dirt that was left behind on the towel left me speechless! I don't wear much makeup. A tinted moisturizer and then a couple small dabs of concealer on the more obvious spots. And I use a makeup remover before I wash. And yet, after washing my face with this "cleansing" bar, there was still dirt left behind. I then used a cleansing toner on a cotton round to see if anything more would come off and, sure enough, more dirt. So now the mystery of why my skin was getting worse is solved. It wasn't actually getting clean. Somehow this works for some people, because majority of the reviews are good. But it's obviously not for me.
faceoff_negative.headline: Doesn't cleanse well
